title: Doctors assaulted by inmate at Kirkland Correctional Institution
title_page: Doctors assaulted by inmate at Kirkland Correctional Institution
maintext:
State prison officials are investigating the assault of two doctors by an inmate at Kirkland Correctional Institution in Columbia.
The assault happened Monday in the maximum-security prison’s Gilliam Psychiatric Hospital, said Sommer Sharpe, public information coordinator for the S.C. Department of Corrections. One inmate was involved.
The doctors were treated on-site by “agency medical staff,” Sharpe said.
No further information was available Tuesday and the investigation into the assault is ongoing, she said.
